name: medical_report
description: Extract information from medical reports including patient details, diagnoses, medications, test results, and treatment recommendations
prompt: Extract medical report information including patient demographics, chief complaint, diagnoses, medications, vital signs, test results, and treatment plans. Preserve medical terminology and provide structured attributes for clinical data.

examples.text:
MEDICAL REPORT

Patient: Sarah Johnson
DOB: 05/12/1985 (Age: 38)
MRN: 123456789
Date of Service: March 15, 2024
Provider: Dr. Michael Chen, MD
Department: Internal Medicine

CHIEF COMPLAINT:
Fatigue and shortness of breath for 2 weeks

VITAL SIGNS:
BP: 140/90 mmHg
HR: 95 bpm
Temp: 98.6°F
Resp: 18/min
O2 Sat: 96% on room air

LAB RESULTS:
Hemoglobin: 8.5 g/dL (Low)
Hematocrit: 25.2% (Low)
WBC: 6,800/μL (Normal)
Glucose: 110 mg/dL (Normal)
Creatinine: 0.9 mg/dL (Normal)

DIAGNOSIS:
1. Iron deficiency anemia (ICD-10: D50.9)
2. Hypertension, uncontrolled (ICD-10: I10)

MEDICATIONS PRESCRIBED:
1. Ferrous sulfate 325mg PO BID
2. Lisinopril 10mg PO daily

TREATMENT PLAN:
- Follow up in 4 weeks
- Repeat CBC in 2 weeks
- Dietary counseling for iron-rich foods
- Monitor blood pressure at home

Next Appointment: April 12, 2024

extractions.extraction_text: Fatigue and shortness of breath for 2 weeks
